sanskrit_verse:
सहस्रं ब्राह्मणो दण्डं दाप्यो गुप्ते तु ते व्रजन् ।
शूद्रायां क्षत्रियविशोः साहस्रो वै भवेद्दमः ॥ ८.३८३॥
transliteration:
sahasraṃ brāhmaṇo daṇḍaṃ dāpyo gupte tu te vrajan |
śūdrāyāṃ kṣatriyaviśoḥ sāhasro vai bhaveddamaḥ || 8.383||
sph_interpretive_translation: A Brāhmaṇa transgressing secrecy in sexual union with a Śūdrā woman shall incur a thousandfold penalty; likewise, a Kṣatriya or Vaiśya engaging secretly with a Śūdrā woman shall bear a thousandfold restraint.

Causation through violation of dharmic relational boundaries
Capacity-based responsibility determined by varṇic role and spiritual station
Restoration logic grounded in purification of relational transgression
Consciousness alignment via reintegration into dharmic order

IF actor = Kṣatriya OR Vaiśya AND act = sexual union with Śūdrā woman AND condition = secrecy THEN restraint = 1000x base measure
IF violation occurs THEN initiate consciousness-realignment protocol aligned to varṇic svadharma
